content: **crocheted hat in drops paris the piece is worked in the round top down and with stripes sizes s-xl ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern no w-826 yarn group c or a + a ------------------------------------------------------- **sizes** s/m - l/xl fits head size 54/56 - 58/60 cm **materials** drops paris from garnstudio belongs to yarn group c 50-50 g colour 29 ice blue 50-50 g colour 17 off white 50-50 g colour 102 spray blue 50-50 g colour 26 beige 50-50 g colour 62 sage green **crochet gauge** 16 double crochets in width and 18 row in height = 10 cm crochet hook drops crochet hook size 4 5 mm hook size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger hook size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller hook size
